# Version History


| Version | Description                                                       |
|:-------:|:------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 2022.1.0 | The first version of this book was released for St. Kieran Catholic Church, Miami, Florida and included music selections from both OCP's *Breaking Bread* (BB) and GIA's *Oramos Cantando / We Pray In Song* hymnals. The preferred hymnal was BB, with at least one BB hymn option provided for every slot based on the 2022 Edition. |
| 2025.1.0 | A second, parish-agnostic, version using OCP's *Breaking Bread* hymnal. |
